title: Active Learning Design for Strengthening Long-Term Retention of Antimicrobial Pharmacology Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Self-paced learning in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments emphasizing practical application skills, characteristic of non-degree programs

learning_goals: Learners can accurately answer 75% or more of questions related to the spectrum of antimicrobial agents in evaluations after 10 weeks
Learners can visually explain the spectral relationships of antimicrobial agents using the flower diagram technique
Learners can link pre-learning materials with active learning sessions to retain complex pharmacological concepts in long-term memory
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
